author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tension prevailed when the members of the Democratic Youth Federation of India (DYFI) and All India Democratic Women’s Association (AIDWA) jointly organised a demonstration on the Cherry Road, near Hasthampatti junction, on Sunday demanding the shifting of a TASMAC outlet.

The police rounded up 55 DYFI and seven AIDWA members. The TASMAC outlet is functioning at a busy point and is surrounded by departmental stores, medical shops, bakery and tea stalls.
title: DYFI, AIDWA members taken into custody
